metadata.notes: No studies met inclusion criteria after full-text screening. All 7 UNSURE records from Level-1 were excluded at Level-2 for lacking distributed/event-driven/microservice architecture descriptions.

evidence_notes: All assessed papers described ASR/MT/TTS pipelines with latency/quality optimization, but none described distributed system architectures with microservice decomposition, event-driven messaging, or distributed deployment infrastructure. Most were model-centric or on-device monolithic systems.
